titleStmt.title: The rights of the people of England, concerning impositions stated in a learned argument, by Sir Henry Yelverton ... ; with a remonstrance presented to the Kings most excellent Majesty, by the honorable House of Commons, in the Parliament, An. Dom. 1610 ...
titleStmt.author: Yelverton, Henry, Sir, 1566-1629.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
